meanings: 대화 도중 My son/daughter was accepted to college.

meanings.meaning: the fruit of the body[loins, womb]

vlive.korean: [제주도 바이브] 우리 아들 최고입니다! [Jeju vibe] My son is the best! 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
vlive.english: [Jeju vibe] My son is the best!

vlive.korean: '회장님 아들은 팬미팅 가면 알 수 있나요?' "Can you know CEO's son by going to fan meeting?" 듣기 View video SF9 : 🌰🌰
vlive.english: "Can you know CEO's son by going to fan meeting?"

vlive.korean: 아들로 삼고 싶은 멤버요? Any member you want as a son? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈입니다!
vlive.english: Any member you want as a son?

vlive.korean: 둘째 말 안 듣는 아들이었어! Second son was the son who didn't listen! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Second son was the son who didn't listen!

vlive.korean: 나 둘째 아들인데? - 아 너 둘째 아들이었구나! I'm the second son. - Oh! You are the second son! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: I'm the second son. - Oh! You are the second son!

examples.korean: He abdicated in favour of his son. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아들을 위해 퇴위했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He abdicated in favour of his son. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My son is being bullied at school. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 아들이 학교에서 괴롭힘을 당하고 있어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My son is being bullied at school. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her son developed asthma when he was two. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 아들은 두 살 때 천식이 생겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her son developed asthma when he was two. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He disdained to turn to his son for advice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 아들에게 조언을 구하는 것을 거부했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He disdained to turn to his son for advice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His face softened as he looked at his son. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자기 아들을 바라볼 때에는 그의 얼굴이 부드러워졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His face softened as he looked at his son. Add to Wordbook
